Question: Guangdong Sohoo Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Sohoo Technology Co., Ltd.

Computer Cases and Power Supplies

- Over 15 years of manufacturing experience
- 60,000 square-meter workshop with 1000+ employees
- Strong R&D team developing up to eight new models monthly
- ISO 9001:2000- and IECQ HSPM QC080000-certified operations
- CE- and RoHS-marked items with one-year warranties
- Products exported to Europe and Americas
- OEM/ODM projects welcome
- Emphasis on quality, service, efficiency, flexibility, innovation, and value
- Located at Sohoo Zone, Junda Road 1, Dongkeng Town, DongGuan City, GuangDong, China
Summary_cn:
广东索虎科技有限公司。

电脑机箱和电源供应

- 15年以上的制造经验
- 1000多名员工的60000平方米车间
- 强大的研发团队，每月开发多达八个新模型
- ISO 9001:2000和IECQ HSPM QC080000认证的运营
- CE和RoHS标志的产品，提供一年保修
- 产品出口到欧洲和美洲
- 欢迎OEM / ODM项目合作
- 着重质量，服务，效率，灵活性，创新和价值
- 位于中国广东东莞东坑镇军达路1号索虎区
